name: Metamorph (itch) (Brothers Arcade)
description:
You are an alien bug trapped in a constant loop of metamorphosis. Find your way to the exist to beat the game. Each stage of metamorphosis gives you access to different parts of the map. Can you figure out what which stage will help you where?

Disclaimer: The game created for LD47 by two people across two different timezones. This was the first time we worked together with that much time and space between us. Still need to work out a few communication kinks.

Instructions:

A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Space - Jump when in the Bug stage or Flap when in the Moth Stage
